data.name: Kiku Wallpaper Launcher - Hanami Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
Hanami Live Wallpaper features four black kittens and a special sakura period during the springtime! Complemented with crafted animations and real-time dynamic parallax effect.

p.s.
After 'live wallpaper' installation within Kiku Wallpaper Launcher click on 'Refresh' button (middle bottom) or simply restart launcher to make sure new 'live wallpaper' appears on the list!
data.about_the_game:
Hanami Live Wallpaper features four black kittens and a special sakura period during the springtime! Complemented with crafted animations and real-time dynamic parallax effect.

data.short_description: Hanami Live Wallpaper with parallax effect.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 1.5+ GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: AMD HD7850, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
